explains: adv. 不可避免地，必然地；意料之中

sentences.en: Are mothers and teens inevitably at loggerheads?
sentences.cn: 母亲与青少年不可避免地会发生争执吗？

sentences.en: Older cars inevitably lack the latest safety refinements.
sentences.cn: 较老式的汽车难免缺乏最新的安全改进。

sentences.en: Inevitably she took out her frustrations on the children.
sentences.cn: 她不可避免地把气出在孩子们身上。
